org.apache.giraph.io.formats

类 SequenceFileVertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,OK extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,OV extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      • org.apache.giraph.io.VertexOutputFormat<I,V,E>
        • org.apache.giraph.io.formats.SequenceFileVertexOutputFormat<I,V,E,OK,OV>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id type
    V - Vertex value type
    E - Edge value type
    OK - Output key data type for a sequence file
    OV - Output value data type for a sequence file
    所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

    public abstract class SequenceFileVertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,OK extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,OV extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends VertexOutputFormat<I,V,E>
    Sequence file vertex output format. It allows to convert a vertex into a key and value pair of desired types, and output the pair into a sequence file. A subclass has to provide two conversion methods convertToSequenceFileKey() and convertToSequenceFileValue().

      • checkOutputSpecs

        public void checkOutputSpecs(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobContext context)
                      throws IOException,
                             InterruptedException
        从类复制的说明: VertexOutputFormat
        Check for validity of the output-specification for the job. (Copied from Hadoop OutputFormat)

        This is to validate the output specification for the job when it is a job is submitted. Typically checks that it does not already exist, throwing an exception when it already exists, so that output is not overwritten.

        指定者:
        checkOutputSpecs 在类中 VertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        context - information about the job
        抛出:
        IOException - when output should not be attempted
        InterruptedException

      • getOutputCommitter

        public org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputCommitter getOutputCommitter(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context)
                                                               throws IOException,
                                                                      InterruptedException
        从类复制的说明: VertexOutputFormat
        Get the output committer for this output format. This is responsible for ensuring the output is committed correctly. (Copied from Hadoop OutputFormat)
        指定者:
        getOutputCommitter 在类中 VertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        context - the task context
        返回:
        an output committer
        抛出:

        InterruptedException

        public VertexWriter createVertexWriter(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context)
                                throws IOException,
                                       InterruptedException
        从类复制的说明: VertexOutputFormat
        Create a vertex writer for a given split. The framework will call VertexWriter.initialize(TaskAttemptContext) before the split is used.
